



```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(broom)
library(zoo)
library(RcppRoll)
library(ggformula)
library(ggpubr)
library(lubridate)


source("./DataProccess.R")

HFGData="../data/HFG data for stats preliminary 3-18-21.xlsx"

HFGFrame=HFGInfo(HFGData)%>%
  mutate("Filter Rep"=as.character(`Filter Rep`))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, dpi=600, fig.width=12, fig.height=8}
HFGFrame%>%
  filter(N1GC<100000000)%>%
  ggplot()+aes(x=Date,y=N1GC,color=`Filter Rep`)+geom_point()+facet_wrap(~Plant,scales="free")+geom_jitter()
```
